text: @WhiteHouse we do not have suicide bombers no more! now we have suicide covid-19 drinkers!! Don't let nobody squirt nothing on you touch you spray you with anything don't touch anything on counters doorknobs watch your car handles all nobs watch people be vigilant!!🇺🇸
